languages.text: "Сколько... золотого..." {n}Кассия восхищенно осматривает сражающихся, словно перед ней не бойня, а священническое служение.{/n} "Словно свет Его пробился сквозь тьму сего места, рассеяв мглу в сердцах сих бойцов. О, как я скучала по непоколебимости этих оттенков".

"So... much... gold..." {n}Cassia stares admiringly at the fighters, as if she is not looking at a massacre but at a liturgy.{/n} "It is as if His light had broken through the darkness of this place, dispelling the gloom in the hearts of these men. Oh, how I have missed the steadfastness of these colours."
languages.original_text: "Сколько... золотого..." {n}Кассия восхищенно осматривает сражающихся, словно перед ней не бойня, а священническое служение.{/n} "Словно свет Его пробился сквозь тьму сего места, рассеяв мглу в сердцах сих бойцов. О, как я скучала по непоколебимости этих оттенков".

Oh, how I missed the steadfastness of these colours."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

Oh, how I have missed the steadfastness of these colours."

traits.locale_text: "So... much... gold..." {n}Cassia stares admiringly at the fighters, as if she is not looking at a massacre but at a liturgy.{/n} "It is as if His light had broken through the darkness of this place, dispelling the gloom in the hearts of these men. Oh, how I have missed the steadfastness of these colours."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Tellement... d'or... » {n}Cassia admire les combattants, comme si elle assistait à une liturgie et non pas à un massacre.{/n} « C'est comme si Sa lumière avait éclairé la noirceur de ce lieu et chassé la tristesse nichée dans le cœur de ces hommes. Oh, comme la constance de ces couleurs m'a manqué ! »
languages.original_text: "So... much... gold..." {n}Cassia stares admiringly at the fighters, as if she is not looking at a massacre but at a liturgy.{/n} "It is as if His light had broken through the darkness of this place, dispelling the gloom in the hearts of these men. Oh, how I have missed the steadfastness of these colours."

traits.locale_text: « Tellement... d'or... » {n}Cassia admire les combattants, comme si elle assistait à une liturgie et non pas à un massacre.{/n} « C'est comme si Sa lumière avait éclairé la noirceur de ce lieu, faisant disparaître la tristesse nichée dans le cœur de ces hommes. Oh, comme la constance de ces couleurs m'a manqué ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “金色……如此……耀眼……”{n}卡西娅盯着那些战士，神色中充满了钦佩，仿佛她看到的并不是屠杀，而是一场礼拜仪式。{/n}“就好像帝皇的明光冲破了这里的黑暗，驱散了这些人心中的阴霾。啊，我已经好久没见过如此充满决心的颜色了。”
languages.original_text: "So... much... gold..." {n}Cassia stares admiringly at the fighters, as if she is not looking at a massacre but at a liturgy.{/n} "It is as if His light had broken through the darkness of this place, dispelling the gloom in the hearts of these men. Oh, how I have missed the steadfastness of these colours."

traits.locale_text: “金色……如此……耀眼……”{n}卡西娅盯着那些战士，神色中充满了钦佩，仿佛她看到的并不是屠杀，而是一场礼拜仪式。{/n}“就好像帝皇的明光冲破了这里的黑暗，驱散了这些人心中的阴霾。啊，我已经好久没见过如此充满决心的颜色了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「黄金が…こんなに…たくさん…」{n}カシアはまるで虐殺ではなく神聖な儀式を見ているかのように、うっとりとした表情で闘士たちを見つめている。{/n}「まるで主の光がこの地の闇を打ち破り、この男たちの心の憂いを拭いさったかのようです。ああ、この色の揺るぎなさを、どれほど恋しく思ったことでしょう」
languages.original_text: "So... much... gold..." {n}Cassia stares admiringly at the fighters, as if she is not looking at a massacre but at a liturgy.{/n} "It is as if His light had broken through the darkness of this place, dispelling the gloom in the hearts of these men. Oh, how I have missed the steadfastness of these colours."

traits.locale_text: 「黄金が…こんなに…たくさん…」{n}カシアはまるで虐殺ではなく神聖な儀式を見ているかのように、うっとりとした表情で闘士たちを見つめている。{/n}「まるで主の光がこの地の闇を打ち破り、この男たちの心の憂いを拭いさったかのようです。ああ、この色の揺るぎなさを、どれほど恋しく思ったことでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "So ... viel ... Gold ..." {n}Cassia starrt die Kämpfer bewundernd an, als wenn sie kein Massaker vor sich hätte, sondern eine Liturgie.{/n} "Als hätte Sein Licht die Dunkelheit dieses Ortes durchbrochen und die Finsternis aus den Herzen dieser Männer vertrieben. Oh, wie sehr ich die Unerschütterlichkeit dieser Farben vermisst habe."
languages.original_text: "So... much... gold..." {n}Cassia stares admiringly at the fighters, as if she is not looking at a massacre but at a liturgy.{/n} "It is as if His light had broken through the darkness of this place, dispelling the gloom in the hearts of these men. Oh, how I have missed the steadfastness of these colours."

traits.locale_text: "So ... viel ... Gold ..." {n}Cassia starrt die Kämpfer bewundernd an, als wenn sie kein Massaker vor sich hätte, sondern eine Liturgie.{/n} "Als hätte Sein Licht die Dunkelheit dieses Ortes durchbrochen und die Finsternis aus den Herzen dieser Männer vertrieben. Oh, wie sehr ich die Unerschütterlichkeit dieser Farben vermisst habe."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Cuánto... dorado...». {n}Cassia observa con admiración a los soldados, como si estuviese presenciando una liturgia en vez de una masacre.{/n} «Es como si la luz del Dios Emperador hubiese atravesado la oscuridad de este lugar y dispersado la desesperación de estos hombres. Oh, cómo he añorado la firmeza de esos colores».
languages.original_text: "So... much... gold..." {n}Cassia stares admiringly at the fighters, as if she is not looking at a massacre but at a liturgy.{/n} "It is as if His light had broken through the darkness of this place, dispelling the gloom in the hearts of these men. Oh, how I have missed the steadfastness of these colours."

traits.locale_text: «Cuánto... dorado...». {n}Cassia observa con admiración a los soldados, como si estuviese presenciando una liturgia en vez de una masacre.{/n} «Es como si Su luz hubiese atravesado la oscuridad de este lugar y dispersado la desesperación de estos hombres. Oh, cómo he añorado la firmeza de esos colores».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Çok... Fazla... Altın..." {n}Cassia, hayranlıkla savaşçıları izliyor. Bir katliama değil de bir ayine tanıklık ediyor gibi görünüyor.{/n} "O'nun ışığı, bu karanlığı delip geçiyor sanki. Bu adamların kalbindeki kederi arındırıyor âdeta. Ah, bu renklerin azmine nasıl da hasretmişim..."
languages.original_text: "So... much... gold..." {n}Cassia stares admiringly at the fighters, as if she is not looking at a massacre but at a liturgy.{/n} "It is as if His light had broken through the darkness of this place, dispelling the gloom in the hearts of these men. Oh, how I have missed the steadfastness of these colours."

traits.locale_text: "Çok… Fazla… Altın…" {n}Cassia, hayranlıkla savaşçıları izliyor. Bir katliama değil de bir ayine tanıklık ediyor gibi görünüyor.{/n} "O'nun ışığı, bu karanlığı delip geçiyor sanki. Bu adamların kalbindeki kederi arındırıyor adeta. Ah, bu renklerin azmine nasıl da hasretmişim…"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
